item.title: 2022-07-03 - Relaxation
item.description: 2022-07-03 Relaxation Most companies do assembly relaxation whereas we do linker relaxation. The assembler typically works on one source at a time so it can’t see anything that is related to other source code files whereas the linker can.

item.title: Testing Relaxation - COREV
item.description: Testing Relaxation - COREV readelf -r on .o files -> looks for particular relocations -> instead of -a it checks if we’re getting the right relocation
